column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: gene activity. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix gene_ontology: <http://geneontology.org/> .gene_ontology:Gene rdf:type owl:Class .gene_ontology:hasActivity rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain gene_ontology:Gene ;    rdfs:range gene_ontology:GeneActivity .gene_ontology:GeneActivity rdf:type owl:Class .gene_ontology:isInvolvedIn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain gene_ontology:GeneActivity ;    rdfs:range gene_ontology:BiologicalProcess .gene_ontology:BiologicalProcess rdf:type owl:Class .gene_ontology:isActivatedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain gene_ontology:Gene ;    rdfs:range gene_ontology:Regulator .gene_ontology:Regulator rdf:type owl:Class .gene_ontology:isSuppressedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain gene_ontology:Gene ;    rdfs:range gene_ontology:Suppressor .gene_ontology:Suppressor rdf:type owl:Class .```
